doc:
Kyle Hebert https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Kyle_Hebert 0 Kyle Henry Hebert ( AY-bair; born June 14, 1969) is an American voice actor who works for anime and video game series, such as the teenage-adult Gohan and the narrator in the Funimation dub of the Dragon Ball series, Sōsuke Aizen in Bleach, Ryu in the Street Fighter video game series, Kiba Inuzuka in Naruto, Kamina in Gurren Lagann, Ryuji Suguro in Blue Exorcist, and Noriaki Kakyoin in JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: Stardust Crusaders. Kyle_Henry_Hebert ( AY-bair ; born June_14_,_1969 ) is an_American_voice_actor who works for anime_and_video_game_series , such_as the_teenage-adult_Gohan and the_narrator in the_Funimation_dub of the_Dragon_Ball_series , Sōsuke_Aizen in Bleach , Ryu in the_Street_Fighter_video_game_series , Kiba_Inuzuka in Naruto , Kamina in Gurren_Lagann , Ryuji_Suguro in Blue_Exorcist , and Noriaki_Kakyoin in JoJo 's_Bizarre_Adventure : Stardust_Crusaders .
